item.title: About
item.description: This is about Dan’s multilingual blog, record problems and solutions about my skills grow process , and those stories saved in my note book. If you like it, please click RSS in home page. The blogs of recommendation: https://github.com/yuin/goldmark https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper The open projects by Dan: https://github.com/vekee/timecard-online https://github.com/vekee/DBMerge https://formsendbox.com If you are interesting in my project or want to know more, see at my GitHub.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I’m a software engineer leaving in Japan. I like read and music, I will very happy if you can share your favorite book with me. If you are interesting in my bolgs or projects, please contact me. duandahai66@gmail.com.

item.title: Projects
item.description: My Projects is updating, please wait for a moment.
